summary: Jordan, forced to close his movie theater due to financial problems, recalls the events, the characters and the films that marked his life.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Massimo Troisi|Marina Vlady|Paolo Panelli|Pamela Villoresi|Giacomo Piperno|Mauro Bosco|Ferruccio Castronuovo|Nicoletta Della Corte|Giada Desideri|Vernon Dobtcheff|Giovanni Febraro|Filippo Greco|Ilaria Liotta|Benigna Luchetti|Marcello Martana|Simon Mizrahi|Paolo Ricci|Michela Santacroce|Marco Totaforti|Massimo Bartocini|Antonio Silvano
title: Splendor
